short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take Anki notes on YouTube with timestamped video.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
English introduction: With the help of Anki's Anki-Connect plugin, and by importing the accompanying template through the plugin page, along with a few simple setup steps, you can start taking notes on YouTube video pages with a single press of Alt+S, and then send them to Anki with just a press of Ctrl+Enter.

✨安装之后，请点击浏览器右上角的插件图标，进入配置页面并了解用法。

✨基本功能：在 YouTube 视频页面一键开始记笔记，然后一键发送含时间戳的笔记到 Anki 进行复习。支持三种形式的记录，分别是直接保存视频，添加批注笔记和添加问答笔记。虽然也支持B 站（Bilibili），但用法稍有不同，请留意插件页的介绍。
